alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Delaware; Madison; Otsego; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 8:42PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTH CENTRAL NEW YORK AND PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST PENNSYLVANIA... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 841 PM EDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Edmeston to near Franklindale and moving east at 40 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Oneonta, Endicott, Norwich, Kirkwood, Conklin, Maine and Rush. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 7. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 65 and 87. Interstate 88 between 1 and 19. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 206 and 230. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chenango; Delaware; Madison; Otsego; Tioga
